title: Ticket #3394: Empty ec2_spot_price should generate a dedicated instance.
description: Tony Tiradani would like to us to ensure that a submit file with blank ec2_spot_price generates a dedicated instance, so as to simplify making spot pricing conditional.
remarks:
2012-Dec-19 14:41:56 by tlmiller:
In a fit of cleverness, we only check if the value is empty, not if the attribute is defined.

2012-Dec-19 14:43:04 by tlmiller:
That is, I have tested a submit file like so

ec2_spot_price =

and it generated a dedicated instance.
creator: tlmiller
